<h3 id="X38042">X(38042) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(5), X(8)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*(b+c)*a^3-(3*b^2+4*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+3*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38042) = X(1)-4*X(3628) = 5*X(2)-X(7967) = X(3)+5*X(5818) = X(3)-7*X(9780) = X(3)+2*X(18357) = X(5)+2*X(10) = 5*X(5)-2*X(946) = 3*X(5)-2*X(3817) = 11*X(5)-2*X(4301) = 2*X(5)+X(5690) = 7*X(5)-4*X(9955) = X(5)-4*X(9956) = 7*X(5)+2*X(11362) = 4*X(5)-X(22791) = X(5)-10*X(31399) = 3*X(5)+2*X(38127) = 5*X(5790)+X(7967) = 3*X(5790)+X(10246) = 2*X(5790)+X(38028) = 5*X(5818)+7*X(9780) = 5*X(5818)-2*X(18357) = 3*X(7967)-5*X(10246) = 2*X(7967)-5*X(38028) = 7*X(9780)+2*X(18357) = 2*X(10246)-3*X(38028)</b>

<p>
X(38042) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 5790}, {5, 38112}, {8, 10247}, {10, 10175}, {355, 3576}, {381, 5657}, {549, 38138}, {1699, 3654}, {3545, 38066}, {3655, 37712}, {3679, 5886}, {3817, 38127}, {3830, 9778}, {4745, 10171}, {5054, 38074}, {5587, 26446}, {5686, 38107}, {5690, 38034}, {5817, 38121}, {10165, 38155}, {10202, 18908}, {10516, 38116}, {11230, 38176}, {15699, 38081}, {38108, 38200}, {38122, 38154}, {38126, 38150}, {38171, 38175}<br>
X(38042) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5, 10175), (549, 11231), (1699, 5066), (3576, 140), (3845, 38140), (5690, 38112), (5886, 547), (8703, 10164), (10175, 9956), (10247, 5901), (10283, 11230), (11230, 10172), (11231, 3828), (15699, 38083), (17504, 38068), (22791, 38034), (23046, 38076), (34773, 3576), (38022, 15699), (38028, 2), (38034, 5), (38041, 38171), (38111, 38204), (38112, 10)<br>
X(38042) = complement of X(10246)<br>
X(38042) = X(8)-Beth conjugate of-X(38112)<br>
X(38042) = X(5)-of-cross-triangle-of-Fuhrmann-and-K798i-triangles<br>
X(38042) = center of the Vu pedal-centroidal circle of X(8)<br>
X(38042) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 5818, 18357), (5, 10, 5690), (5, 5690, 22791), (8, 1656, 5901), (10, 3817, 38127), (10, 5123, 3820), (10, 9956, 5), (10, 25639, 8256), (10, 31399, 9956), (140, 355, 34773), (355, 1698, 140), (1385, 3634, 632), (3090, 3617, 1482), (5070, 12645, 3616), (5587, 19875, 26446), (5818, 9780, 3), (6684, 18480, 550), (7989, 12699, 3850), (10039, 17606, 496), (10172, 38176, 10283), (10175, 38112, 38034), (10175, 38127, 3817), (11230, 38083, 10172), (18391, 31479, 5719), (18481, 31423, 3530), (31447, 33697, 12512), (34122, 38058, 2), (38177, 38178, 5790)<br>
